scripts.dev: node scripts/setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && next dev
scripts.build: node scripts/setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && next build
scripts.build:vercel: node scripts/setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && tsx scripts/init-db-vercel.ts && next build
scripts.build:netlify: node scripts/setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && tsx scripts/init-db-netlify.ts && next build
scripts.build:sls: node scripts/setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && tsx scripts/init-db-serverless.ts && next build
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && next start
scripts.start:deploy: node scripts/setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && next start
scripts.db:setup: node scripts/setup-schema.js && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.setup: node scripts/setup-schema.js && prisma generate && prisma db push && bun run db:init
scripts.setup:prod: node scripts/setup-schema.js && prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && bun run db:init
